original_text: No! Certainly we should not do that! Sin does not rule our lives any longer. That old life is dead! So it is not right that we should continue to do wrong things.
korean_text: 그럴 수 없느니라 죄에 대하여 죽은 우리가 어찌 그 가운데 더 살리요

sentences.original_text: Certainly we should not do that!
sentences.korean_translation: 분명히 우리는 그렇게 해서는 안 됩니다!

sentences.original_text: Sin does not rule our lives
that we should continue to do wrong things
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 계속해서 잘못된 일을 하는 것이
